title: ‘Atlanta’ Season 3, Episode 5 Recap
description:
Van Lathan and Charles Holmes dive into the fifth episode of ‘Atlanta’ Season 3, “Cancer Attack.” They talk about what they believe the show is saying about white fans of hip-hop, the cause of Paper Boi’s creative block, and more.
Hosts: Van Lathan and Charles Holmes
Associate Producer: Jonathan Kermah
